page1.title: HEADER
page1.tf0:
Semboller ekrandaki her yere ödeme yapar. Bir spinin sonunda ekrandaki aynı sembolün toplam
sayısı, kazanma değerini belirler.
page1.item2:
These are the WILD symbols
and substitutes for all symbols
except for BONUS symbol.
They can appear on reels
2, 3 and 4.
page1.item3:
This is the BONUS symbol.
It can appear on all reels.

page2.title: WILD WITH MULTIPLIER
page2.tf0:
At any spin all WILD symbols that hit on screen can
carry a random multiplier of 2x, 3x, 5x, or 10x.
The Split WILD symbol can carry a random
multiplier on each side Multipliers apply to winning
combinations that they are part of. If there are
multiple multiplier part of the same winning
combinations they are added together
page2.tf2:
Hit 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS symbols to trigger
the FREE SPINS round and win 10, 15 or 25
free spins respectively. During the round
hit 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS symbols to retrigger
the feature and win 10, 15 or 25 more free spins
respectively. Special reels are in play during the
free spins round.
page2.tf4:
The maximum win amount is limited to 14,000x bet
in both base game and free spins. If the total
win of a FREE SPINS round reaches 14,000x bet
the round immediately ends, win is awarded and all
remaining free spins are forfeited
page2.tf6:
The FREE SPINS round can be instantly triggered
from the base game by buying it for 100x
current total bet. When buying the FREE SPINS
round, on the triggering spin 3, 4 or 5 or more
BONUS symbols can hit randomly.
During the round hit 2, 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS
symbols to retrigger the feature and win 3,
10, 15, 25 or more free spin respectively.

page3.title: AUTOPLAY
page3.tf0:
Click on the buttons showing the
 number of possible auto-spins to start 
Autoplay
page3.tf1:
SKIP SCREENS option auto-skips the 
feature introduction and end 
screens after a short period of time

page4.title: GAME RULES
page4.tf0:
High volatility games pay out less often on average but
the chance to hit big wins in a short time span is higher.


All Symbols pay from left to right on selected payways.
Free spins win is added to the payway win.
All wins are multiplied by the base bet.
All values are expressed as actual wind in coins.
Only the highest win is paid per way.
When winning with multiple symbols, all wins are added to the total win.

Free spins is awarded to the player after the round completes.
Free spins total win in the history contains the whole win of the cycle.

The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.57%. 
When using "BUY FREE SPINS," the RTP of the game is 96.57%.

SPACE and ENTER buttons on the keyboard can be used to start and stop the spin.
Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
page4.tf4:
Free spins is awarded to the player after
the round completes. The total win from past
Freespins includes the total win of the series.
page4.tf5:
The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.57%. 
When using "BUY FREE SPINS," the RTP of the game is 96.57%.

view and cash view.

page6.title: SETTINGS MENU
page6.tf0:
QUICK SPIN - Select the Quick Spin setting from game
reels to start automatically and stop as soon released

INTRO SCREEN - toggles the introductory screen
on and off

AMBIENCE - toggles the ambient sound and music in
the game on and off

SOUND EFFECTS - Turns the game's sound effects
on and off

GAME HISTORY - Opens the game history page

textCombined1.part2:
scroll between information pages.

 close the information screen

page6.tf3:
The bet menu shows the bet multiplier available
in the game, and the current
total bet in both coins and cash.
page6.tf4: COIN VALUE fields to change the values.
page6.tf5:
The maximum win amount is limited to 14000X bet.
If the total win nof a round reaches 14000X
bet the round immediately ends, win is awarded up to
the cap and all remaining features are forfeited.
page6.tf5_1:
The maximum win amount
is limited to 5000 times the bet.
page6.tf6_1:
A round yields up to 4 DP,
and all remaining features are lost.

page1.title: GAME RULES
page1.tf0:
All Symbols pay from left to right on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost reel.
 Whenever a split symbol appears on the winning line,it multiplies the total win by x2.
page1.item2:
These are the WILD symbols
and substitutes for all symbols
except for BONUS symbol.
They can appear on reels 2, 3
and 4.
page1.item3:
This is the BONUS symbol.
It can appear on all reels.

page2.title: WILD WITH MULTIPLIER
page2.tf0:
At any spin all WILD symbols that hit on screen can carry a random multiplier of 2x, 3x, 5x, or 10x.
The Split WILD symbol can carry a random multiplier on each side. Multipliers apply to winning
combinations that they are part of. If there are multiple multiplier part of the same winning
combinations they are added together
page2.tf2:
Hit 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS symbols to trigger the FREE SPINS round and win 10, 15 or 25 free spins 
respectively.During the round hit 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS symbols to retrigger the feature and win
10, 15 or 25 more free spins respectively. Special reels are in play during the free spins round.
page2.tf4:
The maximum win amount is limited to 14,000x bet in both base game and free spins.
If the total win of a FREE SPINS round reaches 14,000x bet the round immediately
ends, win is awarded and all remaining free spins are forfeited.
page2.tf6:
The FREE SPINS round can be instantly triggered from the base game by buying it for 100x
 current total bet.When buying the FREE SPINS round, on the triggering spin 3, 4 or 5
 or more BONUS symbols can hit randomly.During the round hit 2, 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS
 symbols to retrigger the feature and win 3,10, 15, 25 or more free spin respectively.

Only the highest win is paid per way.
When winning with multiple symbols, all wins are added to the total win.

Free spins total win in the history contains the whole win of the cycle.

The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.57%.
